\"Row Tally Cat\" is a convenient tool designed for knitting enthusiasts. It assists you in keeping track of the number of rows you knit for each of your creations. Upon launching the app, you\'re greeted with the main screen featuring a floating action button for adding a new item.
This button opens a dialog window and here, you can effortlessly add a name and goal for your new creations.

When creating a new item, you\'re required to provide a mandatory field - the item\'s name. Additionally, if desired, you can specify a goal - the target number of rows you intend to achieve. All your creations are displayed in a list format on the same screen. Upon tapping on any item, you\'re taken to a second screen where a row counter specific to that item is presented. The row counter starts at 0 for new creations. Each time you tap on the screen, the counter increases by 1. Furthermore, the second screen features three handy buttons:
Set Goal: This button opens a dialog window where you can set a new goal for the row count or reset the current goal.
Subtract Row: Use this button to decrease the row count by one if you need to make corrections.
Reset Counter: This button allows you to completely reset the row counter back to its initial value of 0.
May your creativity flourish, and let \"Row Tally Cat\" assist you in effectively managing row counts as you work towards bringing your knitting visions to life!
